@metadata.NOTE: Use npm run tx to determine what needs to be translated.

acts_tmpl: The cloud currently has $1 {{PLURAL:$1|action|actions|}} in the history.
autosave: Enable to automatically save whenever anything changes
before_opt_warn: You must ensure that all clients up to date and you are safely connected to the internet before doing this, or you will lose data.
change_val: Change value of $1 to '$2', action report log
chepass-over: Changing the encryption password will overwrite all data in the cloud with what you can currently see in the browser.
chk-pass: Check that you have the correct password
click_char: Click on a character position to see what character it is
cloud_path: Enter the path to your cloud data store
cloud_path_empty: Cloud store path may not be empty
cloud_save_fail: Failed to save in cloud store: $1
cloud_store_path: input label in store settings dialog
complex_image: This should be a complex colour image of at least 1024x768 pixels, preferably with variable transparency.
conf-reset-loc: Please confirm you want to reset your local store. Changes not saved in the cloud will be lost!
confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this node and everything under it?
cont-to-local: If you continue and save, a new local store will be created.
cont-to-over: If you continue and save, the cloud store will be overwritten and you may lose data.
create_cloud: warning, continuing will create a new cloud store
days: days text for option in alarm dialog
empty_image: Steganography image URL may not be empty
hide_vals: Hide values until they are hovered over. Use if someone might be looking over your shoulder
image_load_warn: Note that very large images may take a long time to load and save.
lang_code: Enter the language code for a supported language
license: Licensed under the MIT License. Reuse within proprietary software is permitted provided all copies of the licensed software include a copy of the MIT License terms and the copyright notice.
loc-save-f: Failed to save in local store: $1
local-only: Only the local store will be available, error when cloud store load fails
local_image: Choose a local image that will be copied and used to hide your cloud store.
local_save_fail: Local store could not be saved
lose-history: Optimising your cloud store will lose all the history, which will make it impossible for any client that is not completely up to date to synchronise. You have been warned!
lose-loc: Reset the local store. This will reset the local store from the cloud. Any local changes will be lost.
months: months text for option in alarm dialog
name_pasted: Enter a name for the pasted folder or value
new_entry: Enter the name and value for the new entry
new_folder: Enter the name for the new folder
new_local: A new local store will be created.
new_pass: row in encription pass change dialog
no_changes: No changes needed to be saved
opt_advice: Optimise the store by removing old actions. The cloud keeps a history of all changes from all clients, so that every client has a chance to see every change. This history can get quite long, so you may want to optimise it by removing the history. You should only do this if you are 100% certain that no client has local changes that may need to be saved to the cloud
pass_chars: Enter the characters that are legal in passwords for this site. You can use character ranges like A-Z or 0-9
pick_changes: The following changes were added in the cloud since you last synchronised. Deselect any you don't want to apply (they will be lost!)
randomise: context menu item and dialog title for a new random value
reminder_overdue: dialog box text, $1 is node and $2 is date
save_changes: These changes need to be saved:
show_change_time: Show when the last change happened
tt-epass-change: Change the encryption password for the store
unreadable_local: error message, local store exists, but can't be read.
update-fail: Could not update from cloud store '$1'
url_required: A URL is required for a $1 store
years: years text for option in alarm dialog
